## `IsIncludingExcludedPhraseFirstOccurrence`

Returns whether the first occurrence of an excluded\index{text exclusion} phrase should be included.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
boolean IsIncludingExcludedPhraseFirstOccurrence()
```

### Return value {-}

Type: `boolean`
:::
